<li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFWills2012"><a href="/wiki/Garry_Wills" title="Garry Wills">Wills, Garry</a> (2012). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=7-aynIQRkYcC" rel="nofollow"><i>Lincoln at Gettysburg: The Words that Remade America</i></a>. New York, New York: Simon and Schuster. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-1-4391-2645-5" title="Special:BookSources/978-1-4391-2645-5"><bdi>978-1-4391-2645-5</bdi></a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Lincoln+at+Gettysburg%3A+The+Words+that+Remade+America&amp;rft.place=New+York%2C+New+York&amp;rft.pub=Simon+and+Schuster&amp;rft.date=2012&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-4391-2645-5&amp;rft.aulast=Wills&amp;rft.aufirst=Garry&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3D7-aynIQRkYcC&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AAbraham+Lincoln"></span></li>
<li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFWilsonDavisWilsonHerndon1998">Wilson, Douglas Lawson; Davis, Rodney O.; Wilson, Terry; Herndon, William Henry; Weik, Jesse William (1998). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=s2gilcp4yYQC&amp;pg=PA35" rel="nofollow"><i>Herndon's Informants: Letters, Interviews, and Statements about Abraham Lincoln</i></a>. Univ of Illinois Press. pp. 35–36. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-252-02328-6" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-252-02328-6"><bdi>978-0-252-02328-6</bdi></a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Herndon%27s+Informants%3A+Letters%2C+Interviews%2C+and+Statements+about+Abraham+Lincoln&amp;rft.pages=35-36&amp;rft.pub=Univ+of+Illinois+Press&amp;rft.date=1998&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-252-02328-6&amp;rft.aulast=Wilson&amp;rft.aufirst=Douglas+Lawson&amp;rft.au=Davis%2C+Rodney+O.&amp;rft.au=Wilson%2C+Terry&amp;rft.au=Herndon%2C+William+Henry&amp;rft.au=Weik%2C+Jesse+William&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3Ds2gilcp4yYQC%26pg%3DPA35&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AAbraham+Lincoln"></span></li>
<li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFWilson1999">Wilson, Douglas L. (1999). <i>Honor's Voice: The Transformation of Abraham Lincoln</i>. New York: A. A. Knopf. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-0-307-76581-9" title="Special:BookSources/978-0-307-76581-9"><bdi>978-0-307-76581-9</bdi></a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=Honor%27s+Voice%3A+The+Transformation+of+Abraham+Lincoln&amp;rft.place=New+York&amp;rft.pub=A.+A.+Knopf&amp;rft.date=1999&amp;rft.isbn=978-0-307-76581-9&amp;rft.aulast=Wilson&amp;rft.aufirst=Douglas+L.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AAbraham+Lincoln"></span></li>
<li><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation book cs1" id="CITEREFWinkle2001">Winkle, Kenneth J. (2001). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=JcEVAAAAQBAJ" rel="nofollow"><i>The Young Eagle: The Rise of Abraham Lincoln</i></a>. Lanham, Maryland: Taylor Trade Publishing. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISBN_(identifier)" title="ISBN (identifier)">ISBN</a> <a href="/wiki/Special:BookSources/978-1-4617-3436-9" title="Special:BookSources/978-1-4617-3436-9"><bdi>978-1-4617-3436-9</bdi></a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=book&amp;rft.btitle=The+Young+Eagle%3A+The+Rise+of+Abraham+Lincoln&amp;rft.place=Lanham%2C+Maryland&amp;rft.pub=Taylor+Trade+Publishing&amp;rft.date=2001&amp;rft.isbn=978-1-4617-3436-9&amp;rft.aulast=Winkle&amp;rft.aufirst=Kenneth+J.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3DJcEVAAAAQBAJ&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AAbraham+Lincoln"></span></li>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Official">Official</span></h3>
<ul><li><a class="external text" href="https://presidentlincoln.illinois.gov/" rel="nofollow">Abraham Lincoln Presidential Library and Museum</a></li>
<li><a class="external text" href="https://papersofabrahamlincoln.org/about" rel="nofollow">The Lincoln Presidential Library's ongoing digitization of all documents written by or to Abraham Lincoln during his lifetime</a></li>
<li><a class="external text" href="https://quod.lib.umich.edu/l/lincoln/" rel="nofollow">Collected Works of Abraham Lincoln – complete collected works as edited by Basler et al. (1958)</a> – an online edition available through University of Michigan Library Digital Collections</li>
<li><a class="external text" href="https://www.whitehouse.gov/about-the-white-house/presidents/abraham-lincoln/" rel="nofollow">White House biography</a></li></ul>

</td>
<td rowspan="1" style="width: 40%; text-align: center;"><b> Member of the <a href="/wiki/List_of_United_States_representatives_from_Illinois" title="List of United States representatives from Illinois">U.S. House of Representatives</a><br/>from <a href="/wiki/Illinois%27s_7th_congressional_district" title="Illinois's 7th congressional district">Illinois's 7th congressional district</a> </b><br/>1847–1849
</td>

</td>
<td rowspan="1" style="width: 40%; text-align: center;"><b> <a href="/wiki/Republican_Party_(United_States)" title="Republican Party (United States)">Republican</a> <a href="/wiki/List_of_United_States_Republican_Party_presidential_tickets" title="List of United States Republican Party presidential tickets">nominee</a> for President of the United States </b><br/><a href="/wiki/1860_United_States_presidential_election" title="1860 United States presidential election">1860</a>, <a href="/wiki/1864_United_States_presidential_election" title="1864 United States presidential election">1864</a>

</div><div style="align-self:center"><div class="floatright"><a href="/wiki/Seal_of_the_President_of_the_United_States" title="Seal of the President of the United States"><img alt="" data-file-height="2425" data-file-width="2424" decoding="async" height="85" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/36/Seal_of_the_President_of_the_United_States.svg/85px-Seal_of_the_President_of_the_United_States.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/36/Seal_of_the_President_of_the_United_States.svg/128px-Seal_of_the_President_of_the_United_States.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/36/Seal_of_the_President_of_the_United_States.svg/170px-Seal_of_the_President_of_the_United_States.svg.png 2x" width="85"/></a></div></div></div></div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">Presidency<br/>timelines</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Timeline_of_the_George_Washington_presidency" title="Timeline of the George Washington presidency">Washington</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Timeline_of_the_William_McKinley_presidency" title="Timeline of the William McKinley presidency">McKinley</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Timeline_of_the_Theodore_Roosevelt_presidency" title="Timeline of the Theodore Roosevelt presidency">T. Roosevelt</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Timeline_of_the_William_Howard_Taft_presidency" title="Timeline of the William Howard Taft presidency">Taft</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Timeline_of_the_Woodrow_Wilson_presidency" title="Timeline of the Woodrow Wilson presidency">Wilson</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Timeline_of_the_Warren_G._Harding_presidency" title="Timeline of the Warren G. Harding presidency">Harding</a></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Timeline_of_the_Calvin_Coolidge_presidency" title="Timeline of the Calvin Coolidge presidency">Coolidge</a></li>

</td>
<td style="padding-left:4px; white-space:nowrap"><div style="text-indent: -1.6em; margin-left: 1.6em;"><b><a href="/wiki/List_of_United_States_senators_from_Illinois" title="List of United States senators from Illinois">Senate</a>:</b> <span style="color: #3333FF;">▌</span><a href="/wiki/Sidney_Breese" title="Sidney Breese">S. Breese</a> (D) <b>·</b> <span style="color: #3333FF;">▌</span><a href="/wiki/Stephen_A._Douglas" title="Stephen A. Douglas">S. Douglas</a> (D)</div>
</td>
<td class="nowraplinks" style="padding-left:4px"><div style="text-indent: -1.6em; margin-left: 1.6em;"><b><a href="/wiki/List_of_United_States_representatives_from_Illinois" title="List of United States representatives from Illinois">House</a>:</b> <div class="hlist hlist-separated inline">
<ul><li><span style="color: #3333FF;">▌</span><a href="/wiki/Orlando_B._Ficklin" title="Orlando B. Ficklin">O. Ficklin</a> (D)</li>

</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>

<ul><li>1874
